## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description              | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `closable` | `closable` | Makes the badge closable | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables the badge       | `boolean` | `false` |
